    Python Loop

    Python
    01-12-2020 / Edit on Github

    for #

    for i in range(3):
        print(i)
    1
2
3

    for i in range(3):
        print(i)
    else:
        print('no left')
    0
1
2
no left

    Skip some step #

    # don't contain 5 (way 1)
    for i in [x for x in range(10) if x != 5]:
        print i
    # don't contain 5 (way 2)
    for i in list(range(5)) + list(range(6, 10)):
        print i
    # next (skip 5)
    xr = iter(range(10))
    for i in xr:
        print(i)
        if i == 4: next(xr)
    # continue (skip 5)
    for i in range(10):
        if i == 5: continue
        print(i)

    while #

    i = 1
    while i < 4:
        print(i)
        i += 1
    1
2
3

    You can also use next and continue like in the case of for but with caution!

    break #

    for i in range(6):
        print(i)
        if i==2: break
    0
1
2

    i = 1
    while i < 6:
        print(i)
        if i==3: break
        i += 1
    1
2
3
